title: Coronado National Memorial: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          Coronado National Memorial is continually working to improve access so that everyone can experience this unique landscape. If you have special needs or particular questions, please contact a staff member at (520) 366-5515 or email us. Visitor CenterOpen daily, the building â€“ including the bookstore and exhibits - and rest rooms are fully accessible. A short introductory film is shown on request. The visitor center parking lot has accessible parking.Picnicking at Coronado The picnic area is accessible with a nearby accessible restroom.  Montezuma PassThe parking area at the pass has accessible parking and nearby accessible restrooms.
